import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { removeItem } from '../cartSlice' const CartPageItem:React.FC<{item:any}> = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

{props.item.item.productName}

${props.item.item.price} ${props.item.count * props.item.item.price} ) } export default CartPageItem
